body: im not even sure what the fuck i am anymore when i stumble upon these..

I assume ShowerTime!!'s reaction was more based on shock at the pedophilia and incest of the doujin than the fact that two men (if you can even call the boy a man) were having sex. I think with these areas, disgust is a perfectly normal reaction. I personally don't mind it in hentai or porn, but some do and that's fine.
